name: Noor (SpaceNugget)
description:
This was a game submitted to BahrainJam 2020.

Use painting to help Noor face her inner thoughts and bring them to light. Remember to enjoy the little things: eat a sandwich, pet a cat, watch a movie. 

Stressful times like 2020, childhood trauma, depression and more affect your mental health. These bad thoughts hide deep inside your mind and are difficult to dig out. Noor uses her art to express these thoughts and feelings. As she dives into her psyche, these thoughts start getting manifested with harmful enemies. Glitchy thoughts and overthinking try to prevent her from moving forward. As she dives deeper into the dark parts of her mind, she must hold on to good thoughts and keep fighting to pull out the vermin hiding within.
